tool_description: Retrieve Headers API is a powerful and versatile AWS Lambda-based API that allows you to effortlessly fetch headers from any URL. By simply sending a GET request to our API endpoint, you can obtain a comprehensive set of headers including content type, caching information, server details, and much more. With global deployment across all AWS regions, our API ensures low latency and high availability for users worldwide.
name: Headers For Life
title: Headers For Life
